programme.title: Nicole Kidman
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is actress Nicole Kidman
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is actress Nicole Kidman.
programme.long_synopsis:
Sue Lawley's castaway this morning is the actress Nicole Kidman. Fresh from her West End triumph in The Blue Room, she traces her life from her suburban Australian upbringing to the heart of Hollywood and beyond. She chooses eight records to take to the mythical island.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: What a Wonderful World by Louis Armstrong
Book: Collection of Poems by Emily Dickinson
Luxury: Sun block

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
